Survival of

the fittest.

That’s quite a good idea. Ha ha!

Spencer’s theory was very popular, and before long people began using the phrase “survival of the fittest” when describing Darwin’s theory of evolution.

They say the term “natural selection” is too difficult to understand.

Really?

When I next

revise The Origin

of Species, I guess

I should include

the term “survival

of the fittest”

too.

Well, in that case I’ll need to collect the royalties in full.

Ha ha ha!

Darwin was still very ill, but he could not stop writing his book and continuing his research.

174
